coreAttributes.authorTag: A small tag sewn into the band reads "Sage".
coreAttributes.name: latex panties
coreAttributes.description: A pair of distinctly feminine panties, made from shiny latex. This particular design has a zip that can be pulled down for easy access.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the latex panties, before pulling them up to cover [npc.her] private parts.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the latex panties up [npc2.namePos] [npc2.legs] to cover [npc2.her] private parts.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the latex panties up [npc2.namePos] [npc2.legs] to cover [npc2.her] private parts.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] latex panties down and [npc.verb(kick)] them off [npc.her] [npc.feet].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] down [npc2.namePos] latex panties and [npc.verb(pull)] them off [npc2.her] [npc2.feet].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] latex panties and [npc.verb(yank)] them off [npc2.her] [npc2.feet].
